name: JARPUG
description:
JARPUG is a JRPG made for VR (currently only the Oculus Rift!). It stars a pug with a jar on its head and is being made by Tyrus Peace.

This game is set in the fantastic, magical world of the modern-day dog. Help Pug and her friends learn what has happened to their missing humans. And maybe fix a ghost infestation.

JARPUG is in development! The version for sale is an alpha. It will get more expensive as it gets bigger, but I did my best to make it worth your dollar already.
